__e: I've thought about it a lot, and I think it's because you weren't feeling loved by me, not the way you wanna be loved.
Because now I know if a woman isn't loved by her man... she has nothing else.
I Never Know If I'm Loved For Who I Am Or Because I'm So Pretty.
I'll do anything for you... to show that I love you too
I'd like to tell her just once that she is loved wholeheartedly... but I can't say it in a way that she'd believe.
She becomes afraid that she'll never really know what it's like to be truly loved.
I'm calling to remind you that this evening you're duty bound to attend NCT with your beloved daughter.
There once was a king and his beloved daughter.
I can't say it'll go away soon... but I am sure that if your son... if he could talk to you right now... he would want you to know that you are loved and needed... in this house.
This is your chance to make Mom feel loved and delighted!
A woman does need to be loved, and since you didn't give it to me, I had to find it elsewhere.
I didn't want to say anything in front of your lovely wife there, but the last time I saw you, I was worried about you.
So, does your good wife know that you brought all you have in the world here tonight, and givin' it to a stranger?

You see, Sister, my lovely wife and I have been happily married for 10 years and we've been trying to have kids for a lot longer than that but I think that the good Lord has a higher calling for our family.
That means... not even my lovely sister.
Well, there is one thing I know which you do not with regard to your beloved sister.
How's my lovely sister, by the way?
